channel.title: Blog on Kemble Software
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Kemble Software

item.title: Lavish Polygon Editor
item.description: Lavish Polygon Editor is a set of tools for Polygon Collider 2D that override the default tools to bring you much more flexible and advanced ways to edit your collider polygons.â€‹

item.title: Tool For U
item.description: Tool For U is an extension for the Unity editor that binds the U key (or any other key you desire) to rapidly switch between custom tools relevant to the current selection using either a pie menu or a list-style menu.

item.title: Warp Grid
item.description: Warp Grid - A component for warping, cropping and re-colouring sprites directly in the Unity editor.

item.title: Hello
item.description: Welcome to Kemble Software. Please check me out on Twitter and YouTube!
